title: Latest Photos: Entertainment, News & Sports – Ahmedabad Mirror
text:
In Photos: City comes to a standstill as heavy rains lash Vadodara Heavy rains continue to lash the city of Vadodara and its surrounding areas in Gujarat. The city received record-breaking rainfall in the last 12 hours, hampering daily routines of the locals. Schools and colleges have been shut, services have been ...

Jagannath Rath Yatra 2019: Ritual with great pomp and joy; CM Vijay Rupani, Home Minister Amit Shah mark their presence The Gujarat Rath Yatra began on Thursday morning. Home Minister Amit Shah, who is on a two-day Gujarat tour, participated in the event along with his wife. The procession was also attended by Gujarat CM Vijay Rupani.

Photos: Rain havoc in Ahmedabad; several trees uprooted, cars damaged After the loss faced due to cyclone Vayu, the rains have brought in some much-needed relief, but it has also come with a new set of problems, including water-logging, uprooted trees.

Photos: Gujarat Chief Minister Vijay Rupani, bureaucrat Vikrant Pandey and Air Force celebrate International Yoga Day in Ahmedabad People from all walks of life, including Gujarat Chief Minister Vijay Rupani, District Collector Vikrant Pandey, Air Force officers, BSF officers, and Income Tax staff gathered to celebrate the fifth International Yoga Day in Ahmedabad.
description: Ahmedabad News: Get all latest and breaking news headlines about Ahmedabad includes current affairs, entertainment, sports, videos & Photos from Ahmedabad city.
